constraints.name: move_constraint
constraints.description: 每次操作只能从较小的堆中取一个元素，或从较大的堆中取两个元素。如果两堆大小相同，则可以任选一种操作。
constraints.formal: if a < b: (a-1, b) or (a, b-2); if a == b: (a-1, b) or (a, b-2)

constraints.name: termination_condition
constraints.description: 游戏在某一方取走最后一个元素时结束，该方获胜。
constraints.formal: if a == 0 and b == 1 or a == 1 and b == 0: game ends, current player wins
